The '''Shortcut Wheel''' is an interface that allows the player to quickly access other areas without needing to open the [[Paimon Menu]]. The default keybinds are {{key|Tab}} on PC and {{key|ps-l1}}/{{key|xb-lb}} on controller.

The default entries for the 8-Direction Wheel are:
# [[Wish]]
# [[Adventurer Handbook]]
# [[Inventory]]
# [[Character]]
# [[Map]]
# [[Quests]]
# [[Events]]
# [[Battle Pass]]

The default entries for the 4-Direction Wheel are:
# Wish
# Inventory
# Map
# Events

==Customization==
The Shortcut Wheel can be customized from the [[Settings]] menu after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or higher. The wheel can be set as an 8-Direction Wheel or 4-Direction Wheel.

The available entries are:
{{Column|2|
* [[Shop]]
* [[Party|Party Setup]]
* [[Friends]]
* [[Archive]]
* [[Character Archive]]
* [[Character]]
* [[Inventory]]
* [[Quests]]
* [[Map]]
* [[Events]]
* [[Adventurer Handbook]]
* [[Wish]]
* [[Battle Pass]]
* [[Co-Op Mode]]
* [[Photo Mode|Take Photo]]
* [[Mail]]
* [[Time]]
* [[Settings]]
}}

== Function Menu ==
The Function Menu is a controller exclusive feature available after reaching Adventure Rank 20 or higher. This feature allows a player to access default entries that are not currently bound to the shortcut wheel. The function menu is not directly customizable by the player, however it can be accessed by removing or replacing a default entry from the shortcut wheel then using {{Key|ps-l1}}+{{Keys|ps-r3}} or {{Keys|xb-lb}}+{{Keys|xb-rs}} on a controller.
